## 1010. DRY
### Definition
(Almost) free from liquid or moisture. Antonym of ‘wet’, applicable to as many different types of objects as possible (to be separated from specialized terms like dessicated, dehydrated etc.).  

### Contexts
1. A wet match will not burn, a dry one will. 2. There is a lot of dry grass on the neighbour’s roof. 3. My clothes are already dry, but his are still wet.
